channel.title: Hackers... I need help with item creators etc
channel.description:
Need help with item creation: Players are logging on to my server and creating them selves items on the floor which they then pickup. They just create a new account and spawn any item they wish. Theres also the standard noclipping and attacking non attackable npc's.
Does anybody have any idea how (i know its some kind of client or programme) they are doing this or even better how i can stop it. Theres no point in ipban or banning them as they just change there ip and make a new account.
Thanks in advance :)

item.title: Hackers... I need help with item creators etc
item.dc:creator: @nietmeer nietmeer
item.description:
@nietmeer wrote:

[quote=“Anieli, post:1, topic:367879”]Need help with item creation: Players are logging on to my server and creating them selves items on the floor which they then pickup. They just create a new account and spawn any item they wish. Theres also the standard noclipping and attacking non attackable npc’s.

Does anybody have any idea how (i know its some kind of client or programme) they are doing this or even better how i can stop it. Theres no point in ipban or banning them as they just change there ip and make a new account.

Thanks in advance :)[/quote]

U need to Disable Pickup not enable (= what source u using? Or just -IPBAN- buy i think u lost 40 / 50 % of ur players …
